001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import static io.jstach.jstachio.spi.Templates.sneakyThrow;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
007import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
008
009import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
010import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
011import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
012import io.jstach.jstachio.spi.JStachioFilter.FilterChain;
013
014/**
015 * An abstract jstachio that just needs a {@link JStachioExtensions} container.
016 * <p>
017 * To extend just override {@link #extensions()}.
018 *
019 * @see JStachioExtensions
020 * @author agentgt
021 */
022public abstract class AbstractJStachio implements JStachio, JStachioExtensions.Provider {
023
024        /**
025         * Do nothing constructor
026         */
027        public AbstractJStachio() {
028
029        }
030
031        @Override
032        public void execute(Object model, Appendable appendable) throws IOException {
033                TemplateInfo template = template(model.getClass());
034                var filter = loadFilter(model, template);
035                filter.process(model, appendable);
036
037        }
038
039        @Override
040        public Template<?> findTemplate(Class<?> modelClass) throws Exception {
041                var template = extensions().getTemplateFinder().findTemplate(modelClass);
042                if (template instanceof Template<?> t) {
043                        return t;
044                }
045                final String ind = "\n\t";
046                String reason = " This is usually because the template has not been compiled yet.";
047                throw new NoSuchElementException( //
048                                "Unable to find compiled template." + reason //
049                                                + ind + "template: \"" + template.description() + "\"" //
050                                                + ind + "model type: \"" + modelClass + "\"");
051        }
052
053        /**
054         * Loads the filter and checks if it can process the model and template.
055         * @param model to render
056         * @param template loaded by {@link #template(Class)}
057         * @return filter chain that can process model
058         * @throws IOException if the filter cannot process the model
059         */
060        protected FilterChain loadFilter(Object model, TemplateInfo template) throws IOException {
061                var filter = extensions().getFilter().filter(template);
062                if (filter.isBroken(model)) {
063                        boolean isReflectiveTemplate = Templates.isReflectionTemplate(template);
064                        final String ind = "\n\t";
065                        String reason = "";
066                        if (isReflectiveTemplate) {
067                                reason = " This is usually because the template "
068                                                + "has not been compiled and reflection based rendering is not available.";
069                        }
070                        throw new BrokenFilterException( //
071                                        "Filter chain unable to process template/model." + reason //
072                                                        + ind + "template: \"" + template.description() + "\"" //
073                                                        + ind + "model type: \"" + model.getClass() + "\"" //
074                                                        + ind + "reflection used: \"" + isReflectiveTemplate + "\"");
075                }
076                return filter;
077        }
078
079        @Override
080        public StringBuilder execute(Object model, StringBuilder sb) {
081                try {
082                        execute(model, (Appendable) sb);
083                        return sb;
084                }
085                catch (IOException e) {
086                        sneakyThrow(e);
087                        throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
088                }
089        }
090
091        @Override
092        public String execute(Object model) {
093                return execute(model, new StringBuilder()).toString();
094        }
095
096        @Override
097        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
098                return extensions().getTemplateFinder().supportsType(modelType);
099        }
100
101        /**
102         * Finds the template by model class
103         * @param modelType the class of the model.
104         * @return found template never <code>null</code>.
105         */
106        protected TemplateInfo template(Class<?> modelType) {
107                try {
108                        return extensions().getTemplateFinder().findTemplate(modelType);
109                }
110                catch (Exception e) {
111                        sneakyThrow(e);
112                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
113                }
114        }
115
116}
117
118class DefaultJStachio extends AbstractJStachio {
119
120        private final JStachioExtensions extensions;
121
122        public DefaultJStachio(JStachioExtensions extensions) {
123                super();
124                this.extensions = extensions;
125        }
126
127        @Override
128        public JStachioExtensions extensions() {
129                return this.extensions;
130        }
131
132}
